```{r}
songs = function(url,n=10) {
  data = read_html(url)
  tab = data %>% html_nodes("table") %>% .[1]
  tab = tab %>% html_table %>% .[[1]] 
  tab = tab %>% setNames(c("No.", "Title", "Artist(s)"))
  tab = tab[1:n,] 
  return(tab)
}
```
